Package com.berbils.game.Entities.Towers

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.Entity
      • com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.CircleGameEntity
        • com.berbils.game.Entities.Towers.Tower
  • public class Tower
extends CircleGameEntity
    Creates a tower game object, an enemy object that attacks if the player gets within a set range

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.Entity

        catBits, entityBody, entityBodyDefinition, entityFixture, entityFixtureDefinition, entityShape, entitySprite, isStatic, maskBits, position, screen, sizeDims, spriteHandler, spriteLayer, userData, world

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Tower​(float diameter, float range, int maxHealth, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos, PlayScreen screen, Weapon weapon, java.lang.String textureFilePathDisengaged, java.lang.String textureFilePathEngaged)
      Creates the tower base body, fixture and sprite.Also creates the tower sensor body and fixture in addition to variable assignment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void fire()
      If the tower is alive and can fire, it fires a projectile towards a target
      void onDeath()
      Called upon tower death Updates the screen counter for towers alive If the tower is the last one alive the game screen is updated to the game won screen Else if the tower is not the last one alive, an explosion is created and the towers body, fixture and sprite destroyed.
      void setTarget​(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body target)
      Sets the target for the tower to fire at
      void setWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
      Setter for the towers weapon, also sets the weapons collision filtering
      void takeDamage​(int damageTaken)
      The amount of damage taken from being hit by a projectile
      void update​(float deltaTime)
      The update method needs to be called every world update:The health bar is updated and any explosions caused by the death of the tower are updated to go away after a set amount of time via this

      • Methods inherited from class com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.CircleGameEntity

        defineBox2DEntity, getSizeDims

      • Methods inherited from class com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.Entity

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tower

        public Tower​(float diameter,
             float range,
             int maxHealth,
             com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos,
             PlayScreen screen,
             Weapon weapon,
             java.lang.String textureFilePathDisengaged,
             java.lang.String textureFilePathEngaged)
        Creates the tower base body, fixture and sprite.Also creates the tower sensor body and fixture in addition to variable assignment.
        Parameters:
        diameter - The diameter of the tower base in meters
        range - The range of the tower in meters (The * size of the tower sensor entity)
        maxHealth - The max health for the Tower instance and represents the maximum amount of damage the Tower can take before death
        pos - The position of the tower in meters
        screen - The screen the tower will be created in
        weapon - The weapon object the tower will use to spawn projectiles
        textureFilePathDisengaged - The file path for the texture for when the tower does not have a target in range
        textureFilePathEngaged - The file path for the texture for when the tower does have a target in range

    • Method Detail

      • setWeapon

        public void setWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
        Setter for the towers weapon, also sets the weapons collision filtering
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon the Tower will use to spawn projectiles

      • fire

        public void fire()
        If the tower is alive and can fire, it fires a projectile towards a target

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage​(int damageTaken)
        The amount of damage taken from being hit by a projectile
        Parameters:
        damageTaken - The amount of damage to deal to the towers health

      • onDeath

        public void onDeath()
        Called upon tower death Updates the screen counter for towers alive If the tower is the last one alive the game screen is updated to the game won screen Else if the tower is not the last one alive, an explosion is created and the towers body, fixture and sprite destroyed.

      • setTarget

        public void setTarget​(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body target)
        Sets the target for the tower to fire at
        Parameters:
        target - the target Box2D body to attack/fire at

      • update

        public void update​(float deltaTime)
        The update method needs to be called every world update:The health bar is updated and any explosions caused by the death of the tower are updated to go away after a set amount of time via this
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time in seconds that have elapsed in world time (Excludes time taken to draw, render etc) since the last Gdx delta call.
